text1: This application was designed to make easier to read the abilities of each survivor that the player is using on the games Zombicide Green Horde and Zombicide Black Plague in addition to show their background. If you want to report bugs, you can contact me by email.
text2: Settings and survivors information are saved directly to the local storage of device browser.
text3: If you would like to include any official survivor that are not in this App, please send an email with the data as shown in the example:
text4: List of all the survivors available:
text5: For reading the skills of survivors of the Zombicide Green Horde (and Black Plague as well).
text6: Go to the menu above to configure the language and see your Survivor(s).
reset: Reset survivors information from the local storage
text7: Downloading all survivors may consume up to 50MB.
